title: Justen's CV

basic.intro: I’m Justen, a JavaScript web & mobile developer. I love all things code, education, design, travelling and communication. I am a mentor at the Founders & Coders collective and a member of the DWYL freelancer community.

extra_curricular: Mentoring: Helped set up and mentor Founders & Coders Nazareth
Coding for Everyone Meetup: Set up a weekly meetup focussed on helping people learn how to code
Cycling: I'm a big fan of cycling around. 3 week bikepacking trip through Kyrgystan ✅
Cooking: I enjoy cooking a lot

references.name: Dan Sofer
references.comment: Justen, is a first-class developer with a first-class attitude. I can recommend him without reservation.

references.name: Nelson Correia
references.comment: Words that comes to mind when I think of Justen: Genuine, natural, talented, can-do, focussed, fast-learner, teacher, humble, patience, quiet, humorous, reliable, punctual, well-spoken, empathetic, caring, team-player, leader. </br> He does not fit any text-book 'personality type'. He is well-rounded, grounded and determined and turns his hand to anything in his pursuit of understanding and overcoming a challenge. He is joy to work with and an asset to any team; I would be delighted to work/learn with him again!

work.name: Wexler AI
work.details: The AI copilot for every legal dispute. Helping lawyers with the most time consuming and manual parts of the job, including legal research, document review and drafting.

work.name: Borderless
work.details: Borderless makes sponsorship effortless by bringing together the best of technology and human expertise for compliance, visa processing, sponsor licence assistance, and recruitment.

work.name: Planes
work.details: Slice - Building the UK's only eSIM network available exclusively via an app

work.name: The Daily Muse
work.details: A social journaling platform to reflect and share on a daily journal prompt. Providing opportunities for users to muse over ideas, art, and inspiration, The Daily Muse intends to be a healthier alternative to other forms of written social media.

work.name: Startbook
work.details: Startbook is a web & mobile platform helping entrepreneurship programmes empower the next generation of founders.

work.name: HelloSelf
work.details: A platform providing therapy & coaching to make your Self better.

work.name: Tahora
work.details: Tahora is the culture and wellbeing platform creating inclusive hybrid workplaces with better connected and happier employees.
work.stack: React Native, GraphQL, TypeScript, NodeJS, Postgres

work.name: RegSimple
work.details: A platform to compare regulation around the world in an easily digestible way.

work.name: Spill
work.details: A platform giving employees direct access to message-based therapy.

work.name: Fat Llama
work.details: A peer to peer rental platform.

work.name: Financial Times - Tag Metrics API
work.details: A high throughput API to provide consumers with articles' tagging metrics (page views for a tag, trending tags, etc...).
work.stack: AWS Lambda, Elasticsearch, AWS API Gateway

work.name: Authored DNI
work.details: Google funded research project, in conjunction with The Financial Times, into delivering feedback via notifications to improve workflow.
work.stack: NodeJS, AWS Lambda, React, AWS API Gateway

work.name: Authored.io
work.details: A platform to allow journalists to create, curate and deliver content easily.

work.name: CvAmp
work.details: A JSON cv builder that produces mobile-first valid AMP HTML, used to build this CV.
